post.text: I truly believe that we as Americans can accomplish ANYTHING -- and I promise you, if I'm elected, we will once again experience the American Dream! Let's close the history books on the failures in Washington, and let's open a new chapter of success and prosperity for ALL of our people!

comment.author: Maxwell
comment.text: I've listened to Trump for all of the duration of this campaign and although at the start I wasn't a real fan I've grown to admire this man who single handedly has taken a battered population and sown the seeds for growth, identity, fairness, Liberty, hope and sovereignty. I hope you guys, take this election and soar with your new presidents dreams.. It is not only an American election but we (Australia) as many in this world will be affected by whoever takes the seat. For the sake of God and the world Trump needs to be elected and only you people can do this. Vote, vote, vote, the world is waiting for a change....

replies.author: Callie
replies.text: Your post resonates with a lot of Americans that feel the same way. I too have grown to admire him. He doesn't have to do any of this. He doesn't have to take the daily hate and criticism but he is doing it for us. I am praying that this results in a historic landslide win for Trump.
